title: Garrison and American Anti-Slavery Society - goal

content.question: William Lloyd Garrison and the American Anti-Slavery Society were known for

choices.label: advocating colonization by former slaves in West Africa
advocating the use of tariff revenues to purchase slaves from slaveholders
opposing women’s participation in public abolitionist meetings
supporting the Kansas-Nebraska Act’s provisions regarding slavery

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
